quote: In difficult moments it’s sometimes a good idea to ask yourself what it is you most want to be doing and consider how it can be achieved. If it can’t, move on to the second best thing.
quote_letters: IN DIFFICULT MOMENTS ITS SOMETIMES A GOOD IDEA TO ASK YOURSELF WHAT IT IS YOU MOST WANT TO BE DOING AND CONSIDER HOW IT CAN BE ACHIEVED IF IT CANT MOVE ON TO THE SECOND BEST THING
